pages.text: Now that you've got your feet under you, find out more about the magical equipment and experiences that Amethyst Imbuement can provide.

amethyst_imbuement:progression/scepter_g.text: Start working on crafting a $(l:amethyst_imbuement:starter_guide/scepter_guide)magical scepter$(), and cast your first spell on your chosen spellcasting path.

amethyst_imbuement:progression/jewelry_g.text: Start crafting $(l:amethyst_imbuement:starter_guide/scepter_guide)powerful jewelry$() capable of hosting specialized magical augments.

amethyst_imbuement:progression/totem_gui.text: An incredible font of inner power, a $(l:amethyst_imbuement:starter_guide/scepter_guide)totem of amethyst$() is an important tool in any crystal witches kit.

amethyst_imbuement:progression/equipment.text: $(l:amethyst_imbuement:starter_guide/equipment_guide)Magical armor and weapons$() are at a crystal witches disposal. Legends even mention $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/imbued-gear)Imbued Gear$()
